name: DeGEM
description: Degem is set to takeover of the Ethereum blockchain and claim its rightful ownership as the Blockchain gem eater where holders can earn rewards through its P2E game. Starting with its retro gem hunting game, Degem will evolve into much more than just a gaming platform. We will bring unique NFTs to our ecosystem that are earned or bought by holders of the Degem token. We will also be expanding our game selection with future wagering to come.
